Type.Name: SynchronizationLockException

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit SynchronizationLockException extends System.SystemException

Type.ThreadingSafetyStatement: All public static members of this type are safe for multithreaded operations. No instance members are guaranteed to be thread safe.

summary.para: Represents the error that occurs when a method requires the caller to own the lock on a given , and the method is invoked by a caller that does not own that lock.

remarks.para: is thrown if the , , or methods are invoked for a specified object, but the caller does not own the lock on that object. is also thrown when the method is called to release the lock on an object, but the caller does not own the lock on that object.
To acquire the lock on an object, use . To release the lock on an object, use .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.para: Constructs and initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.para: This constructor initializes the property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "Synchronization method was invoked from an unsynchronized block of code." This message takes into account the current system culture.

Docs.param: A that describes the error. The content of is intended to be understood by humans. The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
